description: Isa Chandra Moskowitz, chatty Brooklyn-native and host of the public access vegan cooking show The Post Punk Kitchen, brings the punk rock culture into the kitchen in this high-energy Vegan recipe book. What’s the cooking philosophy? Be kind to animals and your wallet and still be creative and have fun in the process! Moskowitz writes in an offhand style with scattered stories about NY life and politics, among sophisticated culinary recipes like Seitan and Herb Stuffed Mushrooms, Curried Carrot Bisque, Moroccan Spring Vegetable Tangine with Red Lentils, and Chocolate Raspberry Blackout Cake. Vegan with a Vengeance includes 125 recipes for Breakfast, Muffins & Scones, Appetizers, Soups, Entrees, Cookies, and other Desserts that are so delicious that they are sure to trick even the most stubborn omnivores, and the app is filled with “Punk Points” tricks on how to work with the ingredients, and keep your vegan diet inexpensive and liberated! “Vegan with a Vengeance is on my kitchen shelf. This fun and creative book is delicious for people like me, who don’t eat pets!” - Joan Jett
